title: Westward Decisions
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship navigates politics and choices
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship arranges travel and meetings in Zvervinka with Roman's help, including the purchase of new magic items.
During their stay, they explore the town's contrasts and have dinner with Jela Drask of Rodnya Nivik, learning about local politics.
Lena Sorokina provides travel papers and warns of the dangers from Rhodar von Glauer's giant bats.
Traveling with a caravan, the party reaches Yamgov, and Kenzo dreams of Apollyon's growing threat.
At Voknaz Manor, they're offered a mission to Frostfell, but an invisible Olen Vrask proposes a political move: kill Rhodar von Glauer instead.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship considers a risky political mission to kill a vampire lord after arranging their travel and gaining new allies in Zvervinka.
